text: Celeribacter naphthalenivorans is a Gram-negative, naphthalene-degrading, moderately halophilic, aerobic and motile bacterium from the genus of Celeribacter with a polar flagellum which has been isolated from tidal flat sediments from the South Sea in Korea. ==References== Category:Rhodobacteraceae Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Celeribacter naphthalenivorans
